System.F_PRINTER001: SELECT PRTID AS PRTID FROM F_PRINTER $WHERE
System.F_PRINTER002: DELETE FROM F_PRINTER WHERE USERID = ? AND MENU_CODE = ? AND MENUS_CODE = ? AND OUTCTL = ?
System.F_PRINTER004: UPDATE F_PRINTER SET PRTID = ? WHERE USERID = ? AND MENU_CODE = ? AND MENUS_CODE = ? AND OUTCTL = ?
System.F_PRINTER500: SELECT PRTID FROM F_PRINTER WHERE USERID = ? AND MENU_CODE = ? AND MENUS_CODE = ?
System.F_PRINTER600: SELECT USERID, MENU_CODE, MENUS_CODE, OUTCTL, PRTID FROM F_PRINTER WHERE USERID = ?
